name: Spac-Manvaders
description:
A combination of the two arcade classics Pac-Man and Space Invaders. Collect all the pellets and shoot all the aliens to win!
Made for United Game Jam 2020, with the theme Two. In true arcade fashion, this is not an easy game.

The game fits into the theme as it makes you play those two games at the same time, with linked controls and more…

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move, and space bar to shoot.
